string.text: You are an expert at charging in with your mount to break defensive lines.{newline} {newline}+50% Speed Bonus Damage on Mount
Grants Extra Arrows.
Replaces Nomad Short Bow with Recurved Bow, deals more damage, but is slower.
You are an expert at fighting on horseback.{newline} {newline}Grants Heavy Lance{newline} {newline}+15% Speed Bonus with Pierce Attacks from mount
Grants a long Bomboo Spear, which is longer and lighter.{newline} {newline}Grants Bamboo Spear
Longer Sword
You improved your armor with sturdy metal plates.{newline} {newline}+10 armor{newline}-20% Cut damage taken

Getting hurt puts you in a frenzied rage, you take less damage and deal more damage in melee the more you get hurt.{newline} {newline}+5% Damage per 20 Hitpoints lost{newline}-5% Damage Taken from Melee Attacks per 20 Hitpoints lost
Replaces Falx with Rhomphaia, longer but deals less damage and slower. Deals extra damage against shields.
Superior Bow
You are an expert at fighting on horseback.{newline} {newline}Grants Long Lance{newline} {newline}+33% Speed Bonus with Pierce Attacks from mount
Two Handed Sword, effective at dueling and thrusting, two handed.{newline} {newline}Grants Two Handed Sword{newline}+5% movement speed
Replaces Recurve Bow with a Composite Bow, draws faster and deals more damage.
Nomad Archer
Axe and Shield
Heavy Sabre
Replaces mount with a more maneuverable horse.
Mounted Skirmish
Replaces Crossbow with Arbalest, best in Calradia. Has a reinforced bow arm, increasing effective range.
Replaces mount with a faster and more maneuverable horse.
You know how to profit from equipment the dead has no use for anymore. Kills and assists grant you gold.{newline} {newline}+20 Gold per Kill
You are an expert at protecting yourself and your mount.{newline} {newline}Grants Stronger Shield{newline}-33% Damage taken from Ranged Weapons{newline}-33% Damage taken by Mount from Ranged Weapons
Replaces mount with a faster and more maneuverable horse.

When charging into the enemy lines, you took great pleasure in switching to your close combat weapons and wreak havoc.{newline} {newline}Grants a Bastard Axe {newline}Grants a Better Shield{newline} {newline}+10% Swing Speed while mounted
Armor crafted from higher grade materials.{newline} {newline}+ 13 armor
Replaces mount with a more maneuverable, durable but slower horse that deals more charge damage.
Replaces Sickle with Hammer, effective against armored opponents.
You have impeccable footwork, you aim less affected while moving.{newline} {newline}+50% accuracy while moving{newline}+5% Movement speed
Grants a heavy Sabre, longer and deals more damage.
Grants Sword and Shield, makes blocking easier, making you effective in melee. {newline} {newline}Grants Long Spatha{newline}Grants Round Shield {newline}Grants +5% movement speed
Getting hurt puts you in a frenzied rage, you deal more damage in melee the more you get hurt.{newline} {newline}Grants Axe{newline} {newline}+5% Damage per 20 Hitpoints lost
Grants Heavy Mace, effective against armored opponents.
You are wearing extra layers of padding below your armor.{newline} {newline}+10 armor{newline}-33% Blunt damage taken
Generous Lord
Faster Horse
Looted Shields
Your Shield has more durability and you take less damage from Ranged attacks.{newline} {newline}Grants Stronger Shield{newline}-30% Damage taken from Ranged Weapons
You are a force to be reckoned with, you deal more damage to mobile targets and shields.{newline} {newline}+40% Speed Bonus Damage on Foot {newline}+25% Bonus Damage on Shields
You are an expert at fighting.{newline} {newline}+5% Movement Speed{newline}+10% Damage with Melee Weapons
Made from flexible wood, this bow can be drawn a lot quicker.
Replaces Menavlion with Heavy Menavlion, longer but slower.{newline} {newline}Can Crush Through on Overhead swings.
Medium Infantry
Replaces Recurve Bow with a Composite Bow, draws faster, deals more damage, but less accurate.
You have impeccable footwork, you aim less affected while moving.{newline} {newline}+80% accuracy when moving{newline}+5% Movement speed
Axe Specialist
You are a fighter of the steppe, in combat you stay mobile and dangerous to open up the back of your enemies.{newline} {newline}Grants Short Spear{newline} {newline}+5% Melee Damage
Your experience as a Frontliner allows you fight better in melee.{newline} {newline}Grants Better Twohanded Sword{newline} {newline}+5% Movement Speed {newline}-60% Moving Accuracy Penalty
Long Axe and Shield
Faster Longbow
Pavise Shield
Thick Skin
You are one of the best among your troops, you throw more accurately.{newline} {newline}+50% Initial Ranged Accuracy{newline}+80% Faster Ranged Accuracy Increase
You lead the charge and you are unphased by enemy ranged weapons.{newline} {newline}Grants Kontos{newline} {newline}-30% Damage taken from Ranged Weapons
You are one of the best among your troops, you throw more accurately.{newline} {newline}+60% Initial Ranged Accuracy{newline}+70% Faster Ranged Accuracy Increase
Grants Sword and Shield, makes blocking easier, making you effective in melee. {newline} {newline}Grants Northern Sword{newline}Grants Round Shield {newline}Grants +5% movement speed
Reinforced Armor
Replaces Flyssa with Kaskara, longer and deals more damage.
You are able throw axes much quicker with greater precision, throwing axes also deal extra damage to shields.{newline} {newline} Grants Throwing Axes{newline} {newline}+30% Damage to Shields
Big Game Hunter
Two Handed Axe
Raider Axe

Replaces Tabar with Bardiche, slower but deals more damage.

Agile Horse

You lead the charge and you are unphased by enemy ranged weapons.{newline} {newline}Grants Heavy Kontos{newline} {newline}-35% Damage taken from Ranged Weapons {newline}-35% Damage taken by Mount from Ranged Weapons

Better Bow

You are an expert at fighting while moving around with your bow.{newline} {newline}+25% Faster Movement When moving and aiming{newline}-80% Turning Accuracy Penalty{newline}-80% Moving Accuracy Penalty
